page.title: 10BLOOM FARM HIGH WYCOMBE
page.content: Bloom Farm is in the centre of my square dominated by {woodland}and crops.It has some afforestation.This farm has no livestock except three horses which are pets. The trees that are planted by man are fir trees they are grown so that people who come after us will enjoy fully grown trees. The farmer has nearly every kind of crop both{cereal}and {vegetable.} He has a{tractor}and lots of other machanical implements for sowing and reaping which are found in a modern day farm like this one.
